help.language: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,
help.usage: At which document position shall the text be used; possible values; T - Title, I - Introduction, D - Condition
help.type: which document type is the condition for; possible values: D - Document, E- Email
help.documentType: which Receivable document is the information for; possible values: O - Offer, C - Order Confirmation, D - Delivery Note, I - Invoice
